{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Cube.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = Cube Computer Dev Kit |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.pine64.org/cube/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Pine64 |model = PineCube |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = V1.2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = development board, IP camera |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;S3; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = XTX Tech;XT25F128B; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Allwinner;S3;onchip; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 62:B6:0C |oui = D0:6F:4A
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2010.10;armbian |stockos = Linux;5.10.0;Armbian
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_poe_type = ns |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = USB (Female Micro-B)
|serial = yes, via 26-pin header, (115200 8N1), |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, RGB LCD FPC, Camera 5MP, microphone, speaker, I2C, SPI, UART, GPIO, |addchip = PMIC;X-Powers Limited;AXP209;;1;,,, 1/4" Color CMOS QSXGA Image Sensor;OmniVision;OV5640;;1;,,, 600mA Low Dropout Linear Regulator;AXElite Technology;AX6607;;1;,,, 1A, 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy Corp;SY8088;;1;,,, 18V, 2A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Silergy Corp;SY8120B;;1;,,, Asynchronous Boost Converter for LEDs;Richtek;RT9293;;1;,,, IR Filter Switch Driver;HUINENG Microelectronics;AP1511;;1;,,, Audio Power OpAmp;Shanghai Awinic;AW8155FCR;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = 1234 |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 10/2020 |estprice = 30 |upc = 850796007796 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Tenda JC-TSM89ES <!-- 024c:8179 --> |rad1modif = SDIO (module) |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8189ES; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' S3 @800MHz (ARM Cortex-A7) *Storage: 16MB (QSPI) Flash, Micro SD (TF) slot *Memory: 128MB (DDR3) RAM embedded in processor *USB: 1x USB 2.0 Port *Power: 5V/2A via micro USB or 8-24V Passive PoE or 950-1600mAh 3.7V LiPo battery
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.pine64.org/wiki/PineCube ''PineCube'' on '''Pine64''' Wiki] ([https://github.com/danielfullmer/pinecube-nixos Nix OS]) *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/10/16/pinecube-open-source-linux-ip-camera-devkit-launched-for-30/ ''PineCube open-source Linux IP camera devkit launched for $30'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/pinecube-camera-kit-arrives-for-30/ ''PineCube camera kit arrives for $30'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:PineCube Main Top.jpeg|Main Board Top File:PineCube Main Bottom.jpeg|Main Board Bottom File:PineCube Accessory Top.jpeg|Accessory Board </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
